name: Martian Merchant (Early Development)
description:
Mars was once the hotbed of galactic innovation. And then, nobody ever went there. So now, your duty is to make a bunch of money.

IMPORTANT!

To play, press the spacebar. That simulates a travel action.

Once you've "traveled", a marketplace menu will show up on the screen. Use the "Buy Food", etc buttons to make purchases.

BIG DEAL:

Real travel, selling, more space flying, etc. is coming soon.
